 double distanceFromTo(T a, T b, double priorProbability)

Method Detail

distanceFromTo

double distanceFromTo(T a,
                      T b,
                      double priorProbability)
Some dissimilarity measures are probabilistic in nature, so a prior can be applied to them. For instance, a log probability can be modified by adding the log prior.

Parameters:
priorProbability -
Returns:
